title: Robotics Research / Project Lead
summary: Built assistive robotics systems and autonomy tooling across perception, control, and embedded integration.
bullets: Implemented real-time control + safety constraints for human interaction.
Integrated sensors/actuators + low-level comms for reliable deployments.
Iterated with users to improve usability and task success rate.

title: FPGA / Hardware Acceleration
summary: Designed an FPGA accelerator for compute-heavy workloads and explored performance/latency tradeoffs.
bullets: Designed pipelined arithmetic blocks and memory interfaces.
Measured throughput/latency vs CPU baselines and optimised bottlenecks.

title: Quant / Trading Competitions
summary: Built market-making strategies and tooling to evaluate risk, execution quality, and performance under noise.
bullets: Ran experiments and tuned parameters for stability and PnL.
